## üö® Blockers & Risks

### Current Blockers
- ‚úÖ None - All planning complete

### Potential Risks
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Content Volume:** 96 pages is substantial - maintain quality standards
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Technical Accuracy:** Ensure content stays current with Azure updates
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Visual Assets:** 100+ diagrams require significant time investment
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Consistency:** Maintain tone and quality across all levels

### Mitigation Strategies
- ‚úÖ Comprehensive templates created
- ‚úÖ Quality checklist established
- ‚úÖ Modular approach enables incremental progress
- ‚úÖ Reference files documented for continuity
